name: Lox
description:
Prototype

This game obviously isn't finished. There are only two levels and no sound.
I still had a bit of fun making except releasing it unfinished.
I hope you have fun while playing!

Made in under 4ish hours. I tried exporting to HTML5 as well because i hate to download things, honestly, but GameMaker wasn't feeling like it. And I'm not willing to make my code running for their html5 compiler.
Should've used unity instead...
